channel.title: Compiler issues
channel.description:
I know i might sound retarded for asking this but.... when i get a base server to start off with on this site i cant seem to get my computer to compile the files... and my computer recognizes javac and java but I have C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03 and most of the compilers come with @echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause exit
and whenever i try to edit it. with my JDK it says.... Note: some input files put unchecked or unsafe operations Note: recompile with -xlint:unchecked for details
can anyone teach me how to make my compiler work properly so I can make my server and not leech it.... Thanks I know i sound dumb but I really just want to learn how to do this the right way.....

item.title: Compiler issues
item.dc:creator: @austin_cadle austin cadle
item.description:
@austin_cadle wrote:

[quote=“Jakeb_sil, post:1, topic:436530”]I know i might sound retarded for asking this but… when i get a base server to start off with on this site i cant seem to get my computer to compile the files… and my computer recognizes javac and java but I have C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03 and most of the compilers come with @echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause
exit

and whenever i try to edit it. with my JDK it says…
Note: some input files put unchecked or unsafe operations
Note: recompile with -xlint:unchecked for details
can anyone teach me how to make my compiler work properly so I can make my server and not leech it… Thanks I know i sound dumb but I really just want to learn how to do this the right way…[/quote]
replace: “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac”
with: “C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/javac.exe”

if that doesn’t work you may have a (x86) jre in that case replace it with this:
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\javac”

if for some reason you have jre6 or jre6 (x86) replace it with this:
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\javac” or for the (x86) version: “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javac”
if this does not work you may need to update your jre/jdk and if then it still does not work you may not be following all of the instructions

this should work if not pm me

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler issues
item.dc:creator: @Jakeb_sil Jakeb_sil
item.description:
@Jakeb_sil wrote:

No it didn’t and its really irritating I get it to say that weird message or it says cant find the source path but i dont know how to redirect the compiler to my jdk bin…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler issues
item.dc:creator: @Elfbow Elfbow
item.description:
@Elfbow wrote:

Did it say Finished? That means it works.
